item.title: My great new blog post.
item.description: Bla bla and more bla. 1 + 1 ## [1] 2 Some clever stuff. library(dplyr) ## ## Attache Paket: 'dplyr' ## The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': ## ## filter, lag ## The following objects are masked from 'package:base': ## ## intersect, setdiff, setequal, union library(ggplot2) qplot(x = hp, y = disp, data = mtcars)
